name: The Travels Of The Dung Beetle
name_original: The Travels Of The Dung Beetle
description:
You're a dung beetle.

Why are you rolling around these strange places?

Build up your ball and bury it somewhere nice.

My first Unity game, a very short lil atmospheric romp, made for My First Game Jam! Music and art by me, Louie Zong.

(it seems there's some mild issues with the Mac build, but if you fullscreen and shrink again it should work? i'll work on it)
